title: HELP!!! The new update!
body:
When i tried to login on my accont on lol today was i meet with questions which you get when you log in for the first time, before i knew it my account was on lvl 1! (From lvl 30, ranked bronze) Nothing was left but i could login with the same password and name. 
Can someone help me?!

replies.body: Are you still experiencing this issue?  You may have logged onto a different account.  If it's in regards to the account that you're posting from, I took a look and everything looks okay!  Let me know!
Hey, do you still have all your champs?
